name: Reach Me
description: Reach Me is a colorful physical puzzle in a minimalist style.The goal of this game is to move the blocks onto the platform using special ammunition, as well as various objects in the level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+,Windows 7, Windows 8,Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD2600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
